markdown:
<title level="1" right="Focus 1" pfs="Standard">[Object Memory](/Spells.aspx?ID=624)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Divination" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=47" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Gods & Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=17) pg. 118 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Domain**
[Vigil](/Domains.aspx?ID=55)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Two Actions" /></row>
<row>[somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Target** 1 weapon or tool
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** 1 minute
</row>

</column>

---

By touching an object, you draw forth the experience of those who created and used it. If you touch a weapon, your proficiency rank with that weapon temporarily increases to trained (if it is not already higher). If you touch a tool, your proficiency rank with the next skill check you attempt with that tool (such as a [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) check with a blacksmith’s hammer) within the spell’s duration temporarily increases to trained (if it is not already higher). This spell has no benefit for activities that take longer than a minute to complete.

---
**Heightened (6th)** Your proficiency rank increases to expert instead of trained.
name: Object Memory

If you touch a weapon, your proficiency rank with that weapon temporarily increases to trained (if it is not already higher). If you touch a tool, your proficiency rank with the next skill check you attempt with that tool (such as a Crafting check with a blacksmith’s hammer) within the spell’s duration temporarily increases to trained (if it is not already higher). This spell has no benefit for activities that take longer than a minute to complete. --- Heightened (6th) Your proficiency rank increases to expert instead of trained.
